text: Boola;(Ewe Mohammad) â€œ enywe Abandu Esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye, khwinywe mwesi, owuli nende obwami bwo mwikulu nende khushialo obulao Nyasaye wundi ulali Ye tawe , ahananga obulamu khandi niye ufwisinjia, kho suubile khu Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, owakorwa okhusoma nohomba okhuhandika, Owusubilanga Nyasaye nende amakhuwa keke, kho muloonde injila yiye kho munyoole okhukololokha
